course_description: The course provides an advanced treatment of select topics in operations management, including empirical operations, healthcare, strategy and revenue.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1821, Section #: 5102, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 9-11:20a, Instructor: N. Osadchiy, Status: Open
